Meall nan Tarmachan

Hear pronunciation Press to hear pronunciation

Meall nan Tarmachan is the only Munro summit on the Tarmachan ridge. It can be climbed quickly from Lochain na Lairige but is usually enjoyed as part of a very enjoyable and rocky scramble along the whole ridge. The ridge is very prominent from Killin.

 You have not climbed Meall nan Tarmachan.

Region: Perthshire

Altitude: 1044 metres

Users' Rating:
  • Currently 4.07/5
Rating: 4.1/5 (190 votes cast)

You must be registered and signed-in to vote

Detailed route description and map

The Tarmachan Ridge

Other routes and challenges

The first part of the route described above can be used for a short out-and-back route, but the full ridgewalk given above is one of the finest in the southern Highlands and it would be a real shame to miss it.

One possible but little done alternative would be a horseshoe of ridges around Coire Riadhailt and Coire Glas from the north.

Walker-friendly accommodation in the area

Perthshire Hotels

Perthshire B&B

Perthshire Cottages

Perthshire Hostels
